mapper.sql: cno , mno , content , created_date , modified_date , delete_yn , writer
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO guestbook(mno, content, created_date, modified_date, delete_yn, writer) VALUES (#{mno}, #{content}, NOW(), NULL, 0, #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE guestbook SET modified_date=NOW(), content=#{content} WHERE cno=#{cno}
mapper.delete: UPDATE guestbook SET delete_yn=1 WHERE cno=#{cno}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM guestbook WHERE delete_yn=0 AND mno=#{value} ORDER BY cno ASC
